title: Calories in Toast with Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in toast butter for one slice, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: 1 medium slice (28g) white bread, toasted, topped with 1 tsp (5g) salted butter; no additional spreads or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, butter brand, portion size, and toasting method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of buttered toast provides ~115 kcal, with 6g fat and 3g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of toast with butter?
faqs.a: About 115 kcal for a medium white slice with 1 tsp butter.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in toast butter?
faqs.a: Roughly 6g total fat, including 3.5g saturated fat per slice.

faqs.q: Does toasting change calories in toast butter?
faqs.a: No significant change; toasting mainly affects texture, not calories.

faqs.q: How much protein is in buttered toast?
faqs.a: Around 3g protein per slice, mostly from the bread.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in toast butter?
faqs.a: Yes, use less butter (Â½ tsp saves ~17 kcal) or opt for low-fat spread.
